actions.description: The animated breath makes two Slam attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage plus 11 (2d10) damage of a type determined by the animated breath's form: acid, cold, fire, lightning, or poison.
actions.name: Slam

conditionImmunities: exhaustion, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, restrained, unconscious
name: Animated Breath
resistances: damage of the type matching the animated breath's form (acid, cold, fire, lightning, or poison)

specialTraits.description: When created, the animated breath takes one of five forms, matching its creator's breath weapon: Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, or Poison. This form determines the creature's AC, damage resistance, traits, and attacks.
specialTraits.name: Chromatic Form

specialTraits.description: At the start of each of the animated breath's turns, each creature within 5 feet of it takes 3 (1d6) fire damage, and flammable objects in the aura that aren't being worn or carried ignite. A creature that touches the animated breath or hits it with a melee attack takes 3 (1d6) fire damage.
specialTraits.name: Fire Aura (Fire Form Only)

specialTraits.description: A creature that starts its turn within 5 feet of the animated breath must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned until the start of its next turn. A creature that touches the animated breath or hits it with a melee attack takes 3 (1d6) acid damage.
specialTraits.name: Putrid Aura (Acid and Poison Forms Only)
